CGML-1.A.D.1|message|Package file name should be followed by "pac.vhd".
	Message|component|In Industry mode, PackagePostfix has to be '_pac' not, '_pkg'.|

CGML-1.A.E.2|message|Clock, Reset, and Enable signals should follow recommended naming convention.
	Message|component|In Industry mode, RestInputPort has to be 'reset_x' not, 'reset'.|

CGML-2.C.C.6|message|Asynchronous reset signals were requested. Select 'synchronous' reset to conform to the selected standard.
